24: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
Looks like you're ready to go. Thought you would chicken out. I must admit I was wrong about you!
嚯嚯~看来是准备好了呢，我还以为你会临阵脱逃，看来还是有点骨气的嘛~
うふふ～準備できたみたいね。土壇場になって逃げ出しちゃうかと思ったけど、結構骨があるのね！
우후훗~ 준비된 것 같네. 막판에 도망칠 줄 알았는데 상당히 배짱이 있네!
Ehehe~ Looks like you're ready. I thought you'd chicken out at the last minute, but seems you've got some courage!
Ufufu ~ Parece que você está pronto. Achei que ia fugir no último minuto, mas tenho muitos ossos!
Ho ho ho ~ seems to be ready, I thought you would run away from the battle, it seems to be a bit of backbone well ~
Hmmm~ looks like you're ready to go. I thought you were going to bail at the last minute, but you've got some serious backbone!
msg
You have to be in full preparation if you accept the training, because I'm not as kind and gentle as Sister. Don't expect me to stop when you're crying.
不过既然接受了训练就要做好觉悟~我可不会像姐姐大人那样温柔，到时候哭着喊着我也不会停止的哦~
でも、訓練を受けるからには覚悟しておいてね！私はお姉ちゃんみたいに優しくないよ。泣いても喚いてもやめたりしないからね。
하지만 훈련을 받을 테니까 각오해 둬! 나는 언니처럼 상냥하지 않아. 울어도 소리쳐도 그만두진 않을 테니까.
But be prepared for training! I'm not as gentle as Bronya. I won't stop even when you're crying or screaming.
Mas esteja preparado para o treinamento! Não sou tão gentil quanto minha irmã. Não vou parar de chorar ou gritar.
But since the training should be well aware of ~ I will not be as gentle as my sister, when the time to cry and shout I will not stop Oh ~
But you have to be prepared for the training! I won't be nice to you like your sister. I won't stop crying or screaming.
msg
Don't be afraid. I'm doing this for your own good. Humans are fragile. You can't survive in the Houkai if you are totally untrained.
嘿嘿~你也不用害怕啦，这一切可都是为了你好。想要在崩坏中生存下来没两下子可不行，人类可是十分脆弱的生物呢~
エヘヘ～怖がらないで！全部あなたのためだから。崩壊の中で生き残るには力がないとダメなんだよ。人間はとても弱い生き物だから。
에헤헤~ 무서워하지 마! 전부 너를 위해서야. 붕괴 속에서 살아남으려면 힘이 없으면 안 돼. 인간은 매우 약한 생물이니까.
Ehehe~ No need to be scared! It's all for your own good. You need strength to survive the Honkai. Humans are fragile, after all.
Ehehe ~ Não tenha medo! É tudo para você. Você tem que ter o poder de sobreviver no colapso. Porque os humanos são criaturas muito fracas.
Hey hey ~ you do not have to be afraid of it, it is all for your own good. Want to survive in the collapse without a couple of skills can not, human beings are very fragile creatures it ~
Ahehe~ Don't be afraid! It's all for your own good. You have to be strong to survive the collapse. Humans are very weak creatures.
msg
But I assume that you must learn something from this messed-up world after surviving thus far. Survivors like you are hard to come by these days.
不过你能够活到现在，一定也在这个混账世界中学到了不少生存技巧吧，像你这样被发现的生存者已经越来越少了呢。
でも、今まで生き残って来たんだからその辺は大丈夫だよね。この混沌とした世界で生存スキルを身に着けてきたんでしょ？あなたみたいに発見される生存者って、日を追うごとに少なくなってきているんだよ。
하지만 지금까지 살아남아 왔으니까 그쯤은 괜찮겠지. 이 혼돈의 세계에서 생존 스킬을 익혀 왔겠죠? 너처럼 발견되는 생존자란 날이 갈수록 줄어들고 있단다.

But you've survived so far, so you should be fine. You must've acquired plenty of survival skills in this godforsaken world along the way, haven't you? There are fewer and fewer survivors like you being discovered every day.
Mas eu sobrevivi até agora, então tudo bem. Você adquiriu habilidades de sobrevivência neste mundo caótico, não é? O número de sobreviventes encontrados como você está diminuindo dia a dia.
But you have been able to survive until now, you must have learned a lot of survival skills in this asshole world, like you have been found less and less survivalist it.

But you've survived all this time, so you're okay in that area. You've learned survival skills in this chaotic world. There are fewer and fewer survivors like you to be discovered with each passing day.
msg
Oops. I almost forgot you lost your memories. I'm sorry.
啊~差点忘了你不记得以前的事情了，抱歉抱歉~
あ～忘れてた。あなた以前のこと覚えていないんだったよね。ごめんなさい。
아~ 잊고 있었어. 너 이전의 일을 기억하지 못했었지. 미안해.
Ah~ I forgot you've lost your memories before arriving here. Sorry.
Ah, esqueci. Eu não me lembrava antes de você. desculpe.
Ah ~ almost forgot that you do not remember the previous things, sorry sorry sorry ~
Oh, I forgot. I didn't remember what happened before you. I'm sorry.
msg
Based on the experience of previous battles, I guess you still got hold of some survival instincts. It's just that the way you fight requires improvement, and I'm going to help you.
不过从之前的战斗来看对于生存的本能还是好好保存着呢，只是战斗的方法有些问题，就让我来好好为你矫正一下吧~
でも、この間の戦いぶりからして生存本能はしっかり残っていると思うよ。ただ戦い方に問題があるから、私が少し修正してあげる。
하지만, 지난번 전투 모습을 보면 생존 본능은 확실히 남아있는 것 같아. 다만 싸우는 방식에 문제가 있으니 내가 좀 수정해 줄게.
But based on the way you fought the other day, it seems like you've still got some survival instincts. It's just that your fighting style needs some improvement, so let me correct it for you~
Mesmo em japonês, acho que o instinto de sobrevivência ainda permanece firme na batalha durante esse período. No entanto, há um problema com a forma de lutar, então vou corrigi-lo um pouco.
But from the previous battle to see the instinct for survival is still well preserved, but the method of fighting some problems, let me properly correct it for you ~
But from the way you fought the other day, I think your survival instincts are still strong. But there is a problem with your fighting style, so I will correct it a little.
msg
Let's go! You got a lot of tasks in the base waiting!
那么走吧！基地中可是有很多任务可以来锻炼你哦~
じゃあ行きましょ！色々な任務を受けて鍛えてみよ～！
그럼 가자! 여러 가지 임무를 받아 단련해 보자~!
Well then, let's go! There's plenty of assignments for you to take on for training~!
Vamos! Faça várias missões e treine!
Then let's go! There are many tasks in the base to exercise you Oh!
Let's go! Let's take on some assignments and train!
choice
Shouldn't I take some training first?
刚才不是说要训练么……
訓練って言ってなかった？
훈련이라고 말하지 않았어?
Didn't you say you were going to train me first?
Do I qualify for that?
我的实力真的能够胜任么？
私の実力で本当にできるの？
내 실력으로 정말 할 수 있어?
Are you sure I'm capable of that?
nop

今の状況だと、あなただけに訓練を施すなんて時間の余裕はないの。簡単な任務を積み重ねて鍛えるのが一番効率いいから我慢してね。
지금 상황으로는 당신만 훈련을 시킬 시간의 여유가 없어. 간단한 임무를 쌓아가며 단련하는 게 가장 효율적이니까 참아줘.

Don't worry~! Regular battles are part of training. The battlefield is the best classroom, after all. Now, get your weapons and follow me. (TN: Duplicate of 300258)
Não se preocupe! A prática também faz parte do treinamento. O campo de batalha é a melhor sala de aula. Peguem suas armas e me sigam.
Do not worry about it ~ the actual battle is also a part of the training, the battlefield is the best classroom. Get your weapons ready and follow me!
Don't worry~! Practice is part of training. The battlefield is the best classroom. Get your weapons ready and follow me.

この前は本当に助かったよ。あんたがいなきゃ、戦場にいたやつらは全員お陀仏だったかもしれないからな。みんなに代わって礼を言うよ！
이전엔 정말 도움 많이 됐어. 네가 없었으면 전장에 있던 놈들 전부 죽었을지도 몰랐으니까. 다들 대신해서 고맙다고 전해!

You really saved me the other day. Without you, everyone on the battlefield might've ended up in the afterlife. I'd like to thank you on behalf of everyone! (TN: She says something along the lines of "would have ended up seeing the gates to Heaven", but it sounds weird)
Foi muito útil no outro dia. Sem você, todos os caras no campo de batalha poderiam ter sido mortos. Obrigado em nome de todos!
What happened before was really helpful, without you, those guys on the battlefield might have been moving bricks at the ghost gate, I thank you instead of them ~

28: So you remember now. I knew there's something wrong with your memories, but I didn't know it's that bad. Should I fix you with my fists?
哈？你才想起来么，虽然听说你的记忆出现了问题，看来还是挺严重的，需要我用拳头帮你检查一下么。
はあ？やっと思い出したのか？あんた、記憶に問題があるって聞いていたけど、どうやら相当重いみたいだな。調べてやろっか、拳で。
하아? 겨우 기억해냈어? 너 기억력에 문제 있다던데, 아주 심각한 모양이네. 검사해줄까, 주먹으로.

que? Você ainda quer dormir na cama. Devo colocá-lo de volta?

msg
The Homei mechas is badly damaged from the previous battle. But the engineering team said there were a lot of parts missing, so they couldn't repair it until the necessary parts are delivered.
之前的战斗中吼美机器人的损坏比较严重，但是工程班那边的家伙说由于缺少零件很多都无法修复，需要等待零件补充才行。
この前の戦いあっただろ？その時のホミロボットの損傷が激しくてね。エンジニア班に修理を頼んだんだけど、部品が足りないっていうんだよ。部品の補充をしないと無理だって。
이전 전투 있었지? 그때의 호미로봇 손상이 심해서 말이야. 엔지니어 팀에 수리를 부탁했는데 부품이 모자라다는 거야. 부품 보충을 안 하면 안 된다고.

You remember the battle the other day? The Homi Robot was badly damaged during that battle. I asked the engineering team to repair it, but they said they didn't have enough parts, so they need to wait for more parts to arrive.

Houve uma batalha da última vez? O dano ao robô Homu naquela época foi grave. Pedi à equipe de engenheiros para consertá-lo, mas eles disseram que estavam faltando peças. É impossível sem reposição de peças.

The damage to the Roaring Beauty robot in the previous battle was more serious, but the guy on the engineering side of the class said that due to the lack of parts many of them could not be repaired and needed to wait for parts to be replenished.

You know that battle we had the other day? The Homi robot was badly damaged during that battle. I asked the engineering team to repair it, but they said they didn't have enough parts. They said they would have to replenish the parts.
speaker
portraits
msg
So I see. Resources shortage is really a pain in the neck. Let's wait for the scouting team to come back.
这样啊…现在物资短缺的确比较棘手，看来只能等待外部调查队回来了。
そうなんだ……今の物資不足は確かに頭が痛いよね。外部調査チームが帰ってくるのを待つしかないけど。
그렇구나…… 지금 물자 부족은 확실히 골치 아픈 문제야. 외부 조사 팀이 돌아오기를 기다리는 수밖에 없지만.
Is that so... The shortage of supplies right now is a pain in the neck for sure. We'll just have to wait for the outside investigation team to return.
Isso mesmo... A atual escassez de suprimentos certamente dói na minha cabeça. Eu tenho que esperar a equipe de pesquisa externa voltar.
So...now the shortage of supplies is indeed more difficult, it seems that we can only wait for the return of the external investigation team.
Yes, ...... the lack of supplies right now is definitely a headache. I'll have to wait for the outside survey team to come back, though.
speaker
portraits
msg
We don't have that much time. If a war like this occurs before the supply, no one is guaranteed to be alive on the field.
没有这么多的时间，如果在补给到达之前再发生这样规模的战斗，我可没法保证所有上战场的人都能活着回来。
ハッキリ言って、そんな時間はない。修理前に同じ規模の戦いが起きたら、全員生きて帰れる保証はゼロだ。
확실히 말해서, 그럴 시간이 없어. 수리 전에 같은 규모의 전투가 벌어지면 모두 살아 돌아갈 보장은 제로야.
Frankly, there's no time for that. If a battle of the same scale were to occur before repairs can be made, there'd be zero guarantee that anyone would return alive.
Para ser claro, eu não tenho muito tempo. Se uma batalha da mesma magnitude ocorrer antes do reparo, não há garantia de que todos estarão vivos.
There isn't that much time. If another battle of this scale happens before supplies arrive, I can't guarantee that all the men who go into battle will come back alive.
To be clear, there is no time for that. If a battle of the same magnitude were to occur before the repairs were made, there is zero guarantee that we would all make it out alive.

So what do you want me to do?

msg
The Homei mecha was damaged on the field. Why don't we pick up the broken parts from the field?
既然吼美机器人是在战场上损坏的，那从战场上把损坏的零件带回来不就行了。
つまり、ホミロボットが戦場で壊れたのなら、その戦場から壊れた部品を拾ってくればいいってことさ。
즉, 호미로봇이 전장에서 부서진 거라면, 그 전장에서 부서진 부품을 주워 오면 된다는 거지.
Well, since Homi Robots broke down on the battlefield, you can just scavenge the broken parts there.
Em outras palavras, se o Homu Robo quebrar no campo de batalha, você só precisa pegar as partes quebradas desse campo de batalha.
Since the Howling Beauty robot is damaged on the battlefield, it is not enough to bring back the damaged parts from the battlefield.
In other words, if a hominid robot was broken on the battlefield, you can just pick up the broken parts from that battlefield.

msg

え～？待って！つまり私たちに戦場に行ってゴミ拾いして来いってこと？
에~? 잠깐! 즉 우리들에게 전장에 가서 쓰레기 주우러 오라라는 거야?
Ehh~? Wait! You mean you want us to go to the battlefield to pick up trash?

Huh? Wait a minute! Do you mean for us to pick up trash for you on the battlefield?

言い方の問題だろ。ゴミじゃなくて、戦線医療そのものを維持するための鍵だ。行きたくないならいい……あとで自分で……。
말투 문제잖아. 쓰레기가 아니라 전선 의료 그 자체를 유지하기 위한 열쇠야. 가기 싫으면 말아…… 나중에 내가…….
Don't think of it so negatively. It's not trash, it's the key to maintaining medical care for the frontlines. If you don't want to go... I'll just do it myself later...

31: Emesa only bosses us around. Be careful next time when she commissions you to do something. You don't want to be led by the nose.

まったく。エミザったら人使いが荒いんだから。これからは彼女の依頼には気をつけなきゃ。あごで使われないようにしないと。

Man, Amisha really likes to work people to the bone. You'll have to be careful with her requests from now on and make sure she doesn't lead you by the nose.

Really, Emesa that guy is too good at making people, in the future her commission you have to pay some attention, do not be led by her nose.
Oh, my God. Emesa is so rough with people. I have to be careful with her requests from now on. I have to make sure she doesn't use me as a jawboner.
彼女はいい人だと思う。
たしかに、これからは気をつけよう。
32: Except for her bad temper, she's actually ok. Look, I was just joking around. Don't take it seriously.

うん、気性が荒い以外は確かにいい人なのよ。気にしないで、さっきのは冗談だから真面目にとらないでね！

Yeah, she's definitely a good person if you can get past her temper. Don't worry, I was just joking! You don't have to take it seriously.
Sim, ele é definitivamente uma boa pessoa, exceto que ele tem um temperamento áspero. Não se preocupe, é uma piada, então não leve a sério!
Well, in addition to poor temper is indeed a good guy, well ~ I was just joking not so serious ~
Yeah, he's definitely a nice guy except for his temper. Never mind, that was a joke earlier, don't take it seriously!
33: You too shouldn't be serious, because I was also joking. She indeed is a short-tempered but good person.

え！あなたもそんなに真面目なの。冗談だよ～！あの子は気性が荒い以外はいい人なんだよ。
에! 너도 그렇게 진지한 거야. 농담이야~! 걘 성질이 거친 것 빼고는 좋은 사람이니까.
Hey! No need to be so serious. I was just joking~! She's short-tempered, but she's a good person.
Huh! Você é tão sério também. É uma piada! Aquele garoto é uma boa pessoa, exceto por seu temperamento duro.
You don't have to be so serious. You don't have to be so serious, I was joking ~ that guy is actually a good guy except for his bad temper.
Eh! You are so serious too. I'm just kidding~! That girl is a good person except for her temper.

msg
The mission is simple: collect the shards of parts on the field and bring them back to Emesa.
那么我简单说明一下任务内容吧，寻找收集战场上的零件碎片，把它带回给埃米沙就行了。
じゃあ、簡単に任務の内容を説明するね。戦場にある部品の破片を集めて、それを持ち帰ってエミザに渡せばOKだよ。
자, 간단히 임무 내용을 설명해 줄게. 전장에 있는 부품 파편을 모아서 그것을 가지고 돌아가 에미자에게 넘기면 OK야.

この間の戦闘は終わったけど、戦場の付近には崩壊生物がたくさんうろついているから、部品集めだからって警戒を緩めたりしないようにね。
이번 전투는 끝났지만, 전장 근처에는 붕괴 생물이 많이 돌아다니니까, 부품 모으는 거라고 경계를 늦추지 않도록 해.
